query:
SELECT 
  DAYNAME(entryDate) as day_of_week,
  DAYOFWEEK(entryDate) as day_num,
  COUNT(*) as trade_count
FROM trades
GROUP BY DAYNAME(entryDate), DAYOFWEEK(entryDate)
ORDER BY DAYOFWEEK(entryDate);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2Wv7ueKqB8G6f57.b62a6ae065f5 --database jFmY8c2b9B6TEBRxmcJws8 --execute SELECT 
  DAYNAME(entryDate) as day_of_week,
  DAYOFWEEK(entryDate) as day_num,
  COUNT(*) as trade_count
FROM trades
GROUP BY DAYNAME(entryDate), DAYOFWEEK(entryDate)
ORDER BY DAYOFWEEK(entryDate);
